CHADBOURNE GILPATRIC, ASSISTANT DIRECTOR
Cable Address:
Rockfound, New York
July 9, 195k
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
Let me just briefly acknowledge the arrival here
yesterday of your letter of July 1, 195k, with its
request for a grant to the NAEB for a six-months
experiment in the broadcasting of poetry under the
direction of Mr. Lewis Hill. The proposal seems to
be in excellent form and we shall bring it into
discussion here as promptly as possible. Of course,
at this point I cannot predict what action will be
taken regarding it, but we shall try to give you a
prompt report.
Yours sincerely,
-
Mr. Graydon Ausmus, President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Box 2002
University, Alabama
JM:MEN
Copy to Mr. Lewis Hill
